defaultMessage: Assuming you have not used the Runebase Wallet client before, when you first open the RunebasePrediction Dapp, you are generating a brand new Runebase wallet.
Runebase uses the Bitcoin Core wallet infrastructure.
Bitcoin wallets already contain roughly 100 different addresses assigned to one wallet. This is why you might see new addresses appearing in your wallet.
The Runebase Wallet is responsible for holding your passphrase and private keys. RunebasePrediction Dapp does not store or handle this for you.
We never transmit, receive, or store your private key, passphrase, or other account information.
You are simply using our interface to interact directly with the Runebase blockchain.
If you send your public key (Runebase address) to someone, they can send you RUNEBASE or PRED.
If you send your passphrase, wallet data file, and/or private key to someone, they now have full control of your account.
RunebasePrediction Dapp Uses The Runebase Wallet
